diff_hunk:
@@ -38,8 +38,11 @@ cmake_dependent_option(
     CAFFE2_USE_MSVC_STATIC_RUNTIME "Using MSVC static runtime libraries" ON
     "NOT BUILD_SHARED_LIBS" OFF)
 cmake_dependent_option(
-    BUILD_TEST "Build Caffe2 C++ test binaries (need gtest and gbenchmark)" ON
+    BUILD_TEST "Build Caffe2 C++ test binaries (need gtest and gbenchmark)" OFF
     "BUILD_CAFFE2" OFF)
+cmake_dependent_option(
+    INSTALL_TEST "Install test binaries if BUILD_TEST is on" ON
body: Let's set this to off by default. The idea is to really only install test cases where we need it, i.e. on CI, but never for users as long as they don't explicitly want it.
body_html: Let's set this to off by default. The idea is to really only install test cases where we need it, i.e. on CI, but never for users as long as they don't explicitly want it.
